actionSheetMessage: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
backupCreateRecoveryAgreement: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to restore access to my account
backupCreateRecoverySaveWords: Write down or copy these words in the right order and save them somewhere safe.
backupCreateRecoveryWarningMessage: If you lose your recovery phrase, you will be unable to access your funds, as nobody will be able to restore it.
backupCreateScreenshotWarningSubtitle: Taking a screenshot of your recovery phrase increases security risks of your account.
backupNotificationAlertDescription: If you lose access to your wallet, we will not be able to restore your account if you do not make a backup
backupNotificationDescription: If your recovery phrase is misplaced or stolen, it's the equivalent of losing your wallet. It's the only way to access your wallet if you forget your account password.
backupNotificationNewsAlertDescription: If you would like to subscribe to news at a later time, you can do so in the notification settings section.
backupNotificationTitle: Backup your account, keep your assets safe
backupSssSuggestionDescription: If you lose access to your account, you can always restore it using your social network
backupSssSuggestionTitle: Make your account safer - connect it to the social network
backupVerifyDescription: Please choose the correct  according to the serial number
backupVerifyError: Ooops, mistake in one of the words
backupWarningInfoBlock1: If you lose your recovery phrase, you will be unable to access your funds, as nobody will be able to restore it.
backupWarningInfoBlock2: This phrase is your only chance to recover access to your funds if your device is unavailable to you.
backupWarningParagraph: A backup is a restoring phrase of 12 words. It is better to write down the phrase on paper and not keep it online.
bluetoothPoweredOffDescription: To connect to ledger, you need to turn on Bluetooth on your phone
bluetoothUnauthorizedDescription: The app does not have access to your Bluetooth. Please go to your phone settings and allow the app to use Bluetooth. Without this, we will not be able to find your Ledger Nano X
browserGeolocationPermissionPromptMessag: "{{hostname}}" will use your precise location. Your precise location will be shared with this website because the "Haqq Wallet" app has access to it. Please note: "Haqq Wallet" does not store your location data and will only share it with the website after obtaining your consent.
browserGeolocationPermissionPromptTitle: This website would like to use your current location.
chooseAccountLoadInfo: At the first time, we show only first 5 accounts. If you want to see the next 5 accounts then click the Load more button
claimOnMainnetDescription: You will be able to see the received funds by going to mainnet
claimOnMainnetTitle: Funds have been successfully received on your account in Mainnet
cloudProblemsDescription: We were unable to connect to your {{value}} where a backup file of your account is stored. Please check that your {{value}} is working correctly or restore your account using your mnemonic phrase.
cloudProblemsTitle: We were unable to access your {{value}}
cloudShareNotFoundDescription: It's possible the file was deleted from your cloud storage or there were synchronization issues. We recommend saving the backup file again
cloudShareNotFoundTitle: We couldn't find your backup file in cloud storage
cloudVerificationDescription: It will take a few seconds
createAgreementText: HAQQ Wallet does not store, transfer, transmit, convert, hold, or otherwise interact with any of the Virtual Currencies you may use with the HAQQ Wallet App. Any transfer or transaction occurs on the HAQQ Network(s). HAQQ Wallet cannot block, freeze or take any kind of control over your Virtual Currency.
createOrImportWallet: You must have at least one wallet!
developerModeAttentionDescription: Attention!!! In this mode, browser restrictions will be reset and application functionality will be slightly expanded. The mode is only active in the test network.
deviceSelectDescription: You will be able to manage funds from Ledger or Keystone using HAQQ wallet
deviceSelectKeystoneDescription: Scan the QR code with your camera to link your HAQQ wallet to an existing Keystone device
deviceSelectLedgerDescription: Connect your HAQQ wallet to an existing Ledger device via Bluetooth
earnHint: {{platformCompany}} is not a sponsor of any promotions or prizes mentioned in this application
earnRafflesDescription: Participate in raffles and get prizes
earnStakingDescription: Invest your ISLM in any validator and get additional ISLM

homeEarnEmptyRaffleDescription: Soon you will be able to participate in raffles and receive prizes
homeGovernanceDescription: Voting for changes in the network
homeStakingEmpty: Stake your ISLM in any validator and get additional ISLM
invalidQrCodeSign: Invalid QR code. Please check your hardware and retry.
invalidQrCodeSync: Invalid QR code. Please scan the sync QR code of the hardware wallet.
jailbreakDescription1: In accordance with our security policy, we do not allow use of the application on hacked devices. This is necessary to maintain safety of user funds
jailbreakDescription2: We recommend that you update your device to the original firmware provided by your manufacturer
jailbreakTitle: It is not possible to use the wallet on a hacked device
jsonRpcSignBlidSignWarning: For your security, hex string signing is disabled by default. Malicious transactions can potentially be encoded within hex strings. However, if you wish to enable hex message signing, you can do so in the settings by toggling 'Blind Sign Hex Messages.' Please proceed with caution, as this may expose your wallet to potential risks.
jsonRpcSignPhihsingWarning: We regret to inform you that a malicious transaction has been detected within the message you attempted to sign. As a precautionary measure, message signing has been disabled to safeguard your funds and data. Please review the contents of the message and ensure its integrity before attempting to sign again. If you believe this to be an error, please contact our support team immediately for further assistance.
keystoneCameraPermissionDeniedDescriptio: The app does not have access to your Camera. Please go to your phone settings and allow the app to use Camera. Without this, we will not be able to scan QR code on your Keystone
keystoneCameraPermissionRequestDescripti: The application uses the camera to scan the QR code on your Keystone
keystoneConnectionStepDescription1: Tap “Software Wallet” at the bottom left corner on the Keystone device.
keystoneConnectionStepDescription3: Click on the three-dot button, then click “Connect software wallet” to scan the QR code displayed on the Keystone device.
keystoneQrStep2: After you have signed with Keystone tap on Get Signature
keystoneWalletEnterDeviceNameMessage: Enter device name for new Keystone
keystoneWalletSyncPathError: Keystone will only support the syncronization of the first 10 addresses for Ledger Live derivation path.
ledgerAccountsLoadInfo: At the first time, we show only 5 accounts from your Ledger. If you want to see the next 5 accounts then click the Load more button
ledgerAgreementText: If you have a Ledger Nano X, then you can connect it via Bluetooth to HAQQ Wallet. You will be able to manage funds from Ledger using Islm Wallet
ledgerAttentionTitle: Open Ethereum app on your Ledger and Confirm the transaction by pressing both buttons together
ledgerBluetoothDescriptionDisabled: The app does not have access to your Bluetooth. Please go to your phone settings and allow the app to use Bluetooth. Without this, we will not be able to find your Ledger Nano X
ledgerBluetoothDescriptionUnknown: App uses bluetooth to find, connect and communicate with Ledger Nano devices
ledgerFinishCongratulations: Сongratulations!You have successfully added a new account
ledgerFinishTitle:

ledgerLockedDescription: We can't get information from your ledger. It may be turned off or blocked

ledgerNoAppDescription: Without this application, we will not be able to connect your Ledger. Go to the Ledger Live app and install the Ethereum app
ledgerNoAppTitle: Install the Ethereum app on Ledger
ledgerScanDescription1: Please make sure your Ledger Nano X is
ledgerScanDescription5: Ledger app on your Ledger is installed
ledgerVerifyAddress: Verify address {{address}} on your Ledger Nano X by pressing both buttons together
localeChangeModalDescription: To switch to that language, the application will restart. This is due to the direction of the language and its correct representation
locationUnauthorizedDescription:
HAQQ Wallet requires the precise location
permission to pair your device through Bluetooth.

HAQQ Wallet does not access your location information.
lockedTokensInfoDescription:
Locked tokens are the sum of your tokens - vested tokens and tokens staked by you, including tokens that are in an unbonded period. 

Vested tokens are your tokens but you cannot transfer to other users or use them to pay for gas, but you can delegate to validators - stake to improve the reliability of the HAQQ network, and make a profit. Vested tokens are unlocked according to the schedule
modalDetailsQRWarning: Only {assetName} related assets on {networkName} are supported.
modalDontHaveFeeError: You don't have enough {assetWeiName} to pay the fee
modalQRNoAccessDescription: The app does not have access to your camera. Please go to your phone settings and allow the app to use camera. Without this, we will not be able to scan QR Code
modalRewardErrorDescription: We are giving ISLM for creating the first account. The daily pool for rewards is 100 ISLM. Unfortunately all the rewards for today have been claimed, but try again tomorrow!

recoveryPinDescription: If you have problems changing the PIN code or got "Incorrect password" error, on this screen you can restore access to wallets by entering the pin you wanted to change to.

recoveryPinSuccess: Your PIN code has been successfully recovered
restoreAgreementText: The recovery phrase is a 12-word phrase that you received when you created the account. A private key is a key created by you in the application
restoreAgreementTitle: Do you have your recovery phrase or private key?
restorePasswordAttentionSubtitle: Do not reset the application if you are not sure that you can restore your account. To restore, you will need a recovery phrase of 12 words that you have created for your account
restorePasswordAttentionTitle: Attention. You may lose all your funds!
restorePasswordWarning: Unfortunately, the password cannot be reset. Try to wait a bit and remember the password. If it does not work, then click the ‘Reset wallet‘ button and use the backup phrase to restore the wallet. If there is no backup phrase, then you will not be able to restore the wallet

settingsAccountDetailChangeStyleSubtitle: Change the picture of the account

signContratAttention: This smart contract has not been approved by the IslamicCoin team. Signing the contract is at your own discretion
signNotExitsDescription: There are no linked accounts in our network for the social login you have chosen. Create a new account based on this social login or choose another social login
signNotExitsTitle: We didn’t find the account connect to {{provider}} login {{email}}
signNotRecoveryDescription: To restore, you can enter the old PIN code or choose a different social login
signNotRecoveryTitle: Unfortunately we didn't find the saved recovery file
signSharesNotFoundDescription: Unfortunately, we couldn't find the backup file in your cloud storage or on your phone. Please ensure that the backup file is in place and try the operation again or restore your account from the recovery phrase
signSharesNotFoundTitle: Unfortunately we didn't find the saved recovery file
signinNetworkDisclaimer: To enable Social Login HAQQ wallet collects user’s email but only store the email hash.
signinOldPinTitle: Enter your old HAQQ Wallet PIN
signinPinTitle: Enter your PIN code from HAQQ app
signinRestoreWalletTextFieldPlaceholder: Type or paste your recovery phrase
signupImportantInfoDesc1: **Your mnemonic phrase will be split into three parts,** stored on your local device, in a cloud storage of your choice, and on-chain. Only you have access to these parts, making it very safe.
signupImportantInfoDesc2: To use your mnemonic phrase, you need only two of these three parts. **No one else has access to these parts of your mnemonic phrase.**
signupImportantInfoDesc3: **Should you lose your phone,** mistakenly **delete your HAQQ wallet,** or **forget your PIN.** No need to worry! You can retrieve your wallet through your security phrase using your cloud storage and social login.
signupImportantInfoDesc4: **If you ever remove any part of your mnemonic phrase** stored on your cloud storage, the app will notify you and ensure you fix it.
signupImportantInfoDesc5: It's important to keep your Google or Apple login details safe. If you lose them and if your phone is lost, you won't be able to get your wallet back using your social media login.
signupNetworkExitsAlertDescription: All data on the account will be lost and will not be recoverable
signupNetworkExitsAlertTitle: Are you sure you want to replace your account?
signupNetworkExitsDescription1: You can restore your account or replace it.
signupNetworkExitsDescription2: In case of replacement, all account data will be lost
signupNetworkExitsTitle: You already have an account on {{provider}} login {{email}}
signupNetworkExitsTitleWithoutEmail: You already have an account on {{provider}} login
sliderCaptchaTitle: Drag the slider to fit the puzzle
sssFinishCongratulations: Сongratulations!You have successfully added a new account
sssLimitReachedDescription: Sorry, but it seems like there's been an issue with your Apple/Google account. You've reached the maximum number of requests, so kindly wait for a minute and redo the request
sssLoginLaterDescription: This will help to keep access to the account in case it is lost. You can always enable this feature in your account settings
sssLoginLaterTitle: Are you sure you don't want to enable social login?
sssMigrateAgrementWarning1:
By enabling Social Account, your wallet account will be linked to the chosen Social Login. If you lose access to your Social Login, you can restore your wallet account using the backup phrase, provided you have saved one before.

For the Social Account functionality, we collect users' email addresses but store only the hashed versions of them.
sssMigrateAgrementWarning2: Please note that restoring a wallet account using a Social Account only works with our wallet application.
sssMigrateFinishText: Сongratulations! You've successfully connected your social network.
sssMigrateRewriteAlertDescription: All data on the account will be lost and will not be recoverable
